Home.title: Digital Design & Development.
Home.description: We are a design and development studio specializing in the retail sector. We collaborate with large companies offering services that help them grow and consolidate their digital businesses by providing expertise in digital innovation.
Home.metaDescription: Studio specializing in web and app design and development. We collaborate with large companies, boosting and consolidating their digital businesses with innovation.

About.seoKeywords: Creative studio Barcelona, Design and development team, Bihotz Studio, UX/UI agency, Design culture, User-centered methodology, Collaborative design, Web designers Barcelona, Sabadell web design, Strategic branding
About.altImage: Black and white image showing three Bihotz Studio workers sitting at their office desk
About.title: About Us.
About.description: Our story began in 2021 when Laura decided to start her own venture by founding the studio. With over a decade of experience working with renowned brands like Massimo Dutti, Mango, or Bershka, the early years focused on the vision of creating unique experiences through designs that combine usability and aesthetics.
About.secondaryDescription: In 2024, with a solid track record in projects for Zara and Mango, Roger joined the project to become the other half, leading the technical side of Bihotz. This new phase allows us to offer much more comprehensive services to our clients, providing both development and design solutions.
About.altSecondaryImage: Black and white image showing the door of Bihotz Studio's office, with a vinyl sticker on it
About.metaDescription: Discover the story of Bihotz Studio and its founders Laura Cantabrana and Roger Gomà

Services.seoKeywords: UX/UI design services, Custom web development, Mobile app design, Digital branding for brands, Design system, Shopify for e-commerce, Web design provider, Design and development agency, Responsive web design, Web development Barcelona
Services.metaDescription: Discover the creative services of Bihotz Studio. We offer graphic design, web development, branding, and more to boost your brand and projects. Contact us today!
Services.designDescription: Our design team is dedicated to understanding user needs and behaviors to develop intuitive interfaces focused on usability and aesthetics. We strive to optimize the interaction between users and digital products, providing solutions that are not only visually appealing but also functional.
Services.developmentDescription: We take ideas from conception to digital reality. Our development team works closely with our clients to create custom applications and websites. We excel in implementing scalable and secure advanced technological solutions.
Services.brandingDescription: We offer design services focused on conveying the unique essence of each brand. From creating content for online advertising campaigns to designing graphic elements for social media, banners, and more.
Services.implantDescription: We understand that the successful implementation of digital solutions goes beyond delivering the final product. We integrate directly into the daily operations of our clients, providing continuous advice and support.
Services.backgroundImageAlt: Background image showing a lamp and a table with two chairs

Projects.seoKeywords: Bimani ecommerce design, Pronovias web design projects, Brownie website redesign, Fashion e-commerce design, Digital design system, UI design portfolio, UX success stories, Homepage design for brands, Fashion industry web design, Ecommerce design studio
Projects.descriptionMetaData: Explore the featured projects of Bihotz Studio. Discover our success stories in graphic design, web development, branding, and more. Get inspired by our creative work.

brownie-workshop.seoKeywords: Bihotz Studio, Bihotz, UX/UI Design, Digital Branding, workshop, Design and Development Studio, Barcelona, UX, UI, Brownie, Website Design, Brownie spain, Brownie clothing
brownie-workshop.descriptionMetaData: Discover the Brownie Workshop project by Bihotz Studio. A creative and tailored solution in graphic design and branding to enhance Brownie Workshop's image.
brownie-workshop.description: We collaborated with the Brownie team in a dynamic workshop that brought together various profiles within the company, from the management team to store staff. In this ideation session, we explored and developed innovative concepts for the brand's new APP, ensuring the ideas reflected the needs and perspectives of all organizational levels. The result was a solid foundation for an application that promises to enhance customer experience and strengthen Brownie's digital identity.

page.title: Dynamic workshop with Brownie
page.intro: We explored innovative concepts for the brand's new APP.

section1.title: Warm up
section1.altImage: Design of the Brownie design system project
section1.description: The workshop began with a warm-up session designed to break the ice and foster a collaborative environment.
section1.activitiesTitle: We participated in the following activities:

section2.title: User Persona
section2.altImage: Design of the Brownie design system project
section2.description: The creation of User Personas was a meticulous and iterative process aimed at developing detailed profiles representing different segments of the target audience. This approach ensured that in the subsequent APP design we effectively considered various user needs and grounded our efforts in a deep understanding of the target audience.

section3.title: User Journey
section3.altImage: Design of the Brownie design system project
section3.description1: With the customer profiles from our previous exercise in mind, we mapped the journey each profile would follow when facing a specific task.
section3.description2: This process involved imagining and detailing the steps and interactions these customers would likely experience, from their first contact with the task to its completion.

section4.title: Swot Analysis
section4.altImage: Design of the Brownie design system project
section4.description: We conducted a detailed SWOT analysis to assess the internal and external factors affecting the development and launch of the application. This evaluation helped us better understand our strategic position, allowing us to leverage our strengths, address our weaknesses, capitalize on opportunities, and effectively manage threats during our planning and implementation phases.

section5.title: MVP Conceptualization
section5.altImage: Design of the Brownie design system project
section5.description: Through a series of structured exercises and brainstorming sessions, we determined which features we considered essential to make the Brownie app outstanding. These features were carefully evaluated and placed in a diagram to prioritize them based on their cost/benefit ratio. This approach enables us to focus on implementing high-impact features first, optimizing resource allocation and maximizing the app’s value for users.
activities: Identify essential features for the excellence of the Brownie app.
With the goal of maximizing user value.

pronovias-the-edit.descriptionMetaData: We redesigned Pronovias' editorial pages with a clear and elegant layout, preserving their modern essence and offering intuitive navigation that invites users to explore further.
pronovias-the-edit.description: We redesigned the editorial pages of Pronovias' website, preserving the brand's modern elegance. Our goal was to organize the content in a simple and clear way while respecting the brand’s visual aesthetic. The design ensures an intuitive user journey that encourages further exploration.

brownie-pdp.descriptionMetaData: Discover the redesign of Brownie's Product Detail Page: a more intuitive and visual shopping experience aligned with the brand's aesthetic. Usability and design in service of the product.
brownie-pdp.description: We redesigned Brownie's Product Detail Page to improve usability and ease the purchasing process. Our aim was to make the features and functionalities intuitive and visible, while remaining aligned with the brand’s aesthetic. We also focused on showcasing the product and its attributes in a clear, attractive, and simple way.

brownie-wishlist.descriptionMetaData: We redesigned Brownie's wishlist to provide an intuitive, attractive, and well-organized experience. Create, share, and manage lists effortlessly while preserving the brand's unique style.
brownie-wishlist.description: We redesigned Brownie's wishlist, a fashion brand aimed at young-spirited women. Our goal was to create a clear, intuitive, and visually appealing interface to enhance the user experience, while maintaining the brand’s distinct aesthetic. We focused on integrating features cohesively, allowing users to share their wishlist, create multiple lists, and easily add items. This way, users can find their favorite products quickly, simply, and in an organized manner.

bimani-home.titleMetaData: Bimani Home Page Redesign | Bihotz Studio
bimani-home.descriptionMetaData: We redesigned BIMANI’s home to reflect its new visual identity: an attractive experience that conveys evolution, maturity, and brand essence at first glance.
bimani-home.description: We redesigned BIMANI’s homepage to reflect its new visual identity. BIMANI is in a moment of transition—a change that mirrors its growth, maturity, and evolution. We created a visually attractive experience for the rebranding launch, inviting visitors to explore and fall in love with the brand.

bimani-christmas.descriptionMetaData: We created an immersive microsite for BIMANI’s 2024 Christmas campaign: discover the film, photos, gift guide, and festive looks in a stylish, intuitive, and dynamic experience.
bimani-christmas.description: For BIMANI’s 2024 Christmas campaign, we designed an immersive microsite based on the concept ‘Make a Wish’. Users could discover the campaign film and photos, each telling the story and wishes of different characters. It also featured a Gift Guide, where products were filtered based on character profiles, a festive lookbook, and a page highlighting the benefits of shopping at BIMANI. The design prioritized fluid, intuitive, and immersive navigation, maintaining visual coherence without sacrificing personality or dynamism.

suly.descriptionMetaData: Explore the Suly project by Bihotz Studio. Innovative graphic design and strategic branding to take Suly's image to the next level.
suly.description: We developed the complete web design for Suly, a London-based fashion start-up that defines itself as a conscious tech startup that helps you embrace sustainability. With a modern and functional design, our approach was to highlight their commitment to transforming the fashion industry, simplifying information about sustainability, providing the necessary tools, and enabling users to make more responsible purchasing decisions.

pronovias-fashion-show.seoKeywords: UX/UI design, Digital branding, Pronovias fashion show, 2024,  Design and development studio, Barcelona, UX, UI, Create website, Website design, Pronovias
pronovias-fashion-show.descriptionMetaData: Immerse yourself in the world of event design with the Pronovias Fashion Show project by Bihotz Studio. Creativity and elegance in every detail.
pronovias-fashion-show.description: For the 2024 Pronovias fashion show, we created a microsite that captures the essence of haute couture and modern elegance. Our UI design offers an intuitive and visually impactful user experience, highlighting every detail of the collection with a sophisticated and contemporary approach. The smooth navigation and refined aesthetics ensure that visitors enjoy an immersive and memorable presentation of the event.

five-of-us-web.descriptionMetaData: Discover the Five of Us project by Bihotz Studio. A combination of graphic design and branding to create a unique and memorable identity.
five-of-us-web.description: We developed the complete web design for Five of Us, a brand that offers custom clothing for girls. Our design focused on providing a smooth and engaging user experience, facilitating the process of purchasing made-to-order garments. The intuitive interface guides users through all available customization options, ensuring they can create unique products. The visual aesthetics of the website reflect the distinctive character of Five of Us, combining modern elegance with a firm commitment to traditional craftsmanship.

nicole.descriptionMetaData: Discover the Nicole Milano project by Bihotz Studio. Branding strategy and graphic design for a renowned fashion brand.
nicole.description: We completely redesigned the homepage for Nicole's website, one of the brands of the Pronovias Group, which needed both a functional and visual update. Our goal was to modernize the interface, improving usability and the user experience. With a renewed, elegant, and easy-to-navigate design, the new homepage highlights Nicole's collections and values, offering a visually appealing and optimized experience that invites visitors to explore and fall in love with the brand.

brownie-ds.seoKeywords: UX/UI Design, Digital Branding, Design System, Brownie DS, Design and Development Studio, Barcelona, UX, UI, Brownie, Website Design, Brownie Spain, Brownie Clothing
brownie-ds.descriptionMetaData: Explore the Brownie Design System project by Bihotz Studio. Creation of a coherent and efficient design system for the Brownie brand.
brownie-ds.description: We developed a complete Design System for Brownie, unifying the design elements for both their APP and website. This system ensures visual and functional coherence across all of the brand's digital platforms, facilitating a smooth and attractive user experience. It includes detailed style guides, reusable components, and design patterns that reflect Brownie's identity and values, ensuring efficient and consistent implementation across all digital touchpoints.
brownie-ds.atomicDesignDescription: Following the principles of Atomic Design, the components are a scalable and adaptable part of the design system.
brownie-ds.consistencyDescription: We provide a uniform experience, fostering user trust and familiarity. This consistency is crucial for improving user satisfaction and retention.
brownie-ds.variablesDescription: The components include variables for different use cases, such as design adjustments, color schemes, and content types. This flexibility allows it to be easily adapted to specific needs on different pages like PLP, wishlist, search, etc.
brownie-ds.accessibilityDescription: We incorporate accessibility features and design tokens for color, spacing, and other variables. This connection ensures that the components are visually consistent and accessible to all users, promoting inclusion.
brownie-ds.efficiencyDescription: With detailed specifications, including design guides, component states, and usage documentation, developers can implement the component quickly and correctly, speeding up the development process and reducing errors.
brownie-ds.accelerationDescription: With well-defined components, designers can quickly prototype and iterate on created interfaces. This accelerates the overall design process, allowing for faster response times for new features and updates.
brownie-ds.footer: Unified design, Enhanced expirience, Optimized efficiency
